sentence.text: This phenotype is associated with increased cytosine methylation heterogeneity, but not with increased somatic diversification of immunoglobulins-mediated somatic mutation burden.
Reciprocally, the cytosine methylation heterogeneity characteristic of normal GC B cells is lost upon somatic diversification of immunoglobulins depletion.
These observations are relevant to human patients, since DLBCLs with high somatic diversification of immunoglobulins expression manifest increased methylation heterogeneity vs. AICDA-low DLBCLs.

Our results identify somatic diversification of immunoglobulins as a driver of epigenetic heterogeneity in B-cell lymphomas with potential significance for other tumors with aberrant expression of cytidine deaminases
